Adverts, pay to win, and pay walls. Everything you need in a game children can play. The concept is great, but the constant reminder that EA is trying to fleece you for money stops you from ever properly enjoying the game. The problem with pay to win is that you can never be sure if it's skill, luck or money. That takes the fun out of those challenging moments when you are wondering the whole time have they made this hard just for money. Play the first one and stop there.
